price: "E cumpri a oração e temei-O. E Ele é Aquele a Quem sereis reunidos"
arabic: وَأَنۡ أَقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَٱتَّقُوهُۚ وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ إِلَيۡهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wa-an aqīmū al-ṣalata wa-ittaqūhu wahuwa alladhī ilayhi tuḥ'sharūna
